name: Garlic Chicken & Broccoli
description: This is a placeholder description for Garlic Chicken & Broccoli.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper, then cook until golden brown on both sides.
Add garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add broccoli and cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Serve hot with your choice of side.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with ground beef and tomato sauce.
instructions: Brown the ground beef in a large pan over medium heat, breaking it apart with a spoon.
Add chopped onion and garlic, cooking until softened.
Stir in tomato sauce and let it simmer for 20-25 minutes, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti and enjoy!

name: Veggie Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy stir fry with fresh veggies and tofu.
instructions: Press tofu to remove excess moisture, then cut into cubes.
Heat some oil in a wok or large pan over medium-high heat.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Add sliced carrots, bell pepper, and broccoli, and stir fry for about 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir to coat the veggies and tofu.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes, then serve hot.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A creamy pasta dish made with chicken, garlic, and a rich Alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat and cook chicken until golden brown.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Add parmesan cheese and stir until sauce thickens.
Serve the chicken and sauce over the cooked pasta.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Ground beef seasoned with taco spices, served in a soft or hard taco shell.
instructions: Brown the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat.
Add taco seasoning and water as directed on the packet, cook for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill taco shells with beef and top with cheese, lettuce, and your favorite toppings.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A fresh and healthy salad with grilled chicken, romaine, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Grill or cook chicken breast and slice thinly.
Toss lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing together.
Top with sliced chicken and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.

name: Vegetable Soup
description: A hearty and healthy vegetable soup with carrots, potatoes, and beans.
instructions: Chop the vegetables into small pieces.
In a large pot, combine all ingredients with vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
description: Stir fry with chicken, vegetables, and a savory soy sauce.
instructions: Slice the chicken and vegetables into small pieces.
In a wok, heat oil over medium-high heat and cook chicken until browned.
Add vegetables and cook for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Fried Rice
description: A quick and tasty fried rice dish with vegetables, egg, and soy sauce.
instructions: Cook the rice and set aside.
In a large pan, scramble the eggs until fully cooked.
Add diced carrots and green onions and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the rice and soy sauce, stir to combine, and cook for 5 minutes.

name: Baked Salmon
description: A simple and healthy baked salmon with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until salmon is cooked through.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: A light and refreshing pasta dish with seasonal vegetables and olive oil.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté zucchini and squash in olive oil until tender.
Toss the cooked pasta with the vegetables and top with parmesan cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: Grilled chicken slathered in smoky barbecue sauce.
instructions: Grill chicken breasts until cooked through.
Brush with barbecue sauce during the last few minutes of grilling.

name: Shrimp Tacos
description: Tacos filled with spicy shrimp, avocado, and a tangy slaw.
instructions: Season and cook shrimp until pink and cooked through.
Fill taco shells with shrimp, sliced avocado, and cabbage slaw.

name: Lentil Soup
description: A nutritious and hearty soup made with lentils and vegetables.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large pot.
Simmer for 30-40 minutes until lentils are tender.
